messages.subject: Re: NHK Shinsengumi Stars
messages.msgSnippet: Yes, Jo has an impressive collection of knitted hats...the hats *and* his role in Azumi should be [forgotten] Tanihara s purse is in fact a fanny pack with a
messages.messageBody:
Yes, Jo has an impressive collection of knitted hats...the hats *and*
his role in Azumi should be [forgotten]

Tanihara's purse is in fact a fanny pack with a key chain type thing.

Here is the ENTIRE file to download
http://1happyturtle.com/NHKstars.zip

Some of my favorite pics
http://1happyturtle.com/NHKSano1.jpg
http://1happyturtle.com/NHKSano2.jpg
http://1happyturtle.com/NHKSano3.jpg
http://1happyturtle.com/NHKSano4.jpg
http://1happyturtle.com/Tanihara.jpg
http://1happyturtle.com/Tanihara1.jpg

--- In SHQ_Spy_Division@yahoogroups.com, BarbaraSheridan
<bsher213@b...> wrote:
The hats! I still have
> flashbacks to the hats~~
>
> ...and Tanihara's visiting Denmark "purse" but let's not discuss
that...
>
> --
> Barbara Sheridan
> http://www.barbarasheridan.net

messages.messageBody:
*smirk*
Ironic isn't it that the pictures of the REAL JO ---those high crimes
against fashion ones--are conspicuously absent??? The hats! I still have
flashbacks to the hats~~

...and Tanihara's visiting Denmark "purse" but let's not discuss that...

Barbara Sheridan

messages.subject: NHK Shinsengumi Stars
messages.msgSnippet: Tama collected a series of TV shows/interviews featuring our favorite NHK Shinsengumi! Stars Special thanks to Barb for letting me borrow the dvds I am almost
messages.messageBody:
Tama collected a series of TV shows/interviews featuring our favorite
NHK Shinsengumi! Stars
Special thanks to Barb for letting me borrow the dvds
I am almost done screencapping and will share the files as zip file
soon (all jpegs of reasonable size)...

(the caps have pics of Masato Sakai, Koji Yamamoto, Katori Shingo,
Shosuke Tanihara, and Taro Yamamoto)

[but in the meantime here is a preview of JO ODAGIRI]

he looks like the *PERFECT* live action RK Saitou in this picture
(^_^)
http://1happyturtle.com/JO/JoRKSaitou.jpg

The eyes...
http://1happyturtle.com/JO/Joeyes.jpg

JO enjoys adding LOTS Of gel to his hair...here are pics of him
with "normal" plain old clothes and hair which does not defy
gravity...he looks just fine
http://1happyturtle.com/JO/Jonormal.jpg
http://1happyturtle.com/JO/Jonormal1.jpg
http://1happyturtle.com/JO/Jonormal2.jpg
he has an ELEGANT PROFILE
http://1happyturtle.com/JO/Jonormal3.jpg

AIM really messes up my computer so if I'm chatting and all of
sudden "user has just signed off" or equivalent message pops up its
because AIM and my modem are not getting along...it's a really weird
problem I can't solve until the computer geeks open their store...
